abstract: Citigroup‘s infrastructure fund has purchased a 50 percent stake in Canda’s YVR Airport Services, as part of its push to invest in airports worldwide, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s infrastructure fund has purchased a 50 percent stake in Canda’s YVR Airport Services, as part of its push to invest in airports worldwide, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Citigroup Fund Flies With Airport Investment
